title: Negombo Tourism Area Land
details:
VALUABLE PROPERTY IN TOURISM AREA

20 perch valuable property facing the main road (along Lewis Place - Poruthota Road) available for sale. Beach is 2 blocks away from the proposed land. About 20 meters from beach.

This land is ideal to build a Luxery House /Apartment complex/ Hotel. A possible building on this land can have a good view of the sea.

Expected price is 3.1 million a perch.

Since this is a rare opportunity in this locality, early response will be highly appreciated.
Please communicate with me for any further details.

Suren
072 6471529

NO BROKERS PLEASE.
Dont call /Message us for Other Services
